original_text: Nevertheless, I have this against you: You tolerate that woman Jezebel, who calls herself a prophet. By her teaching she misleads my servants into sexual immorality and the eating of food sacrificed to idols.
korean_text: 그러나 네게 책망할 일이 있노라 자칭 선지자라 하는 여자 이세벨을 네가 용납함이니 그가 내 종들을 가르쳐 꾀어 행음하게 하고 우상의 제물을 먹게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless, I have this against you:
By her teaching she misleads my servants
and the eating of food sacrificed to idols.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우상에게 바친 음식을 먹게 한다
